title: PARTY / CUNO MAIN
description: CUNO'S main hub inside whirling and on the island. It's like KIM MAIN

dialogueTree.title: Cuno: ""Cuno's a pig now." He picks his to..."
dialogueTree.text: "Cuno's a pig now." He picks his tooth with a dirty fingernail.

links.title: You: ""I've had these weird shakes recent..."
links.text: "I've had these weird shakes recently. And something like... visions? Sounds familiar?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Totally, pig. Cuno's in the same s..."
links.text: "Totally, pig. Cuno's in the same shit every time he's coming off speed." His tone gets parental. "You need to *medicate* that shit."

links.title: You: ""No, it's more than that. It's like..."
links.text: "No, it's more than that. It's like the city is speaking to me."

links.title: Cuno: ""Ah, Cuno's not into that hallucino..."
links.text: "Ah, Cuno's not into that hallucinogenic shit -- that's for pussies."

links.title: You: ""No, I don't think it's actually dr..."
links.text: "No, I don't think it's actually drug related..."

links.title: Cuno: ""If you wanna take a real blasto, g..."
links.text: "If you wanna take a real blasto, go down the coast to the old church, where the speedfreaks hang."

links.title: Cuno: ""Tell 'em Cuno sent you. They'll kn..."
links.text: "Tell 'em Cuno sent you. They'll know what it means."

links.title: You: ""Well, I have been partying a lot l..."
links.text: "Well, I have been partying a lot lately..."

links.title: Cuno: ""You gotta hit *Magnesolam*, when y..."
links.text: "You gotta hit *Magnesolam*, when you get off the train, pig. I always hit it to get the mag back."

links.title: You: ""Mag?""
links.text: "Mag?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Magnesium, pig.""
links.text: "Magnesium, pig."

links.title: You: ""Cuno, I have couple of questions a..."
links.text: "Cuno, I have couple of questions about Martinaise."

links.title: Cuno: ""Shoot," he says with a nod. "Cuno..."
links.text: "Shoot," he says with a nod. "Cuno knows this shithole better than anyone."

links.title: You: ""What are your thoughts on the stri..."
links.text: "What are your thoughts on the strike?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Uh..." He looks confused. "Well yo..."
links.text: "Uh..." He looks confused. "Well you know, pig... Shit's fucked. And like... Cuno's got no time for this small time shit. Cuno's got *enterprises* to run."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Apparently he has never formed an o..."
links.text: Apparently he has never formed an opinion on the matter and isn't going to do so on the fly either.

links.title: You: ""So who's side are you on?""
links.text: "So who's side are you on?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Whose side's Cuno on?!" His tone g..."
links.text: "Whose side's Cuno on?!" His tone gets angry. "Cuno's on fucking Cuno's side, pig! This is beneath the Cuno. Don't talk to me about this playground bullshit. You're getting shit in Cuno's head."

links.title: Empathy: "Being put in the spotlight like thi..."
links.text: Being put in the spotlight like this makes him feel exposed, makes him lash out.

links.title: You: ""Small time shit. Got it.""
links.text: "Small time shit. Got it."

links.title: Cuno: "The kid nods, obviously relieved."
links.text: The kid nods, obviously relieved.

links.title: You: ""What's going on with the traffic j..."
links.text: "What's going on with the traffic jam?"

links.title: Cuno: ""What do you mean, what's going on?..."
links.text: "What do you mean, what's going on? This is good shit." He seems surprised. "You wouldn't believe the crap Cuno's getting from the trucks."

links.title: You: ""What have you gotten there?""
links.text: "What have you gotten there?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Oh, pig..." A clever smile runs ac..."
links.text: "Oh, pig..." A clever smile runs across his face. "Cuno's done with that shit. Cuno's a pig now. Living the pig-life. That reaver shit's behind him."

links.title: You: ""Whose statue is it on the roundabo..."
links.text: "Whose statue is it on the roundabout?"

links.title: Cuno: ""It's Cuno's," he says without paus..."
links.text: "It's Cuno's," he says without pause or hesitation.

links.title: You: ""I'm pretty sure it's of Filippe II..."
links.text: "I'm pretty sure it's of Filippe III the Squanderer, the greatest of Flippian kings of Revachol..."

links.title: Cuno: ""If you know that history buff shit..."
links.text: "If you know that history buff shit, then why are you fucking Cuno with this?" He shrugs. "Cuno's a pig now. Has important shit on his mind. Pig shit."

links.title: You: ""Okay. Cool.""
links.text: "Okay. Cool."

links.title: Cuno: "He nods in agreement."
links.text: He nods in agreement.

links.title: You: ""What do you know about the village..."
links.text: "What do you know about the village southwest, across the canal?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno used to hang there sometimes...."
links.text: "Cuno used to hang there sometimes. It's a real shit-hole. Everyone is old or a fucking drunk or dead, except..."

links.title: You: ""Except what?""
links.text: "Except what?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Except nothing." He shrugs. "That..."
links.text: "Except nothing." He shrugs. "That shit is behind Cuno. Keep your nose out of it."

links.title: Empathy: "You know who isn't old, drunk, or d..."
links.text: You know who isn't old, drunk, or dead? Lilienne.

links.title: You: ""You like Lilienne, don't you?""
links.text: "You like Lilienne, don't you?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Wha-what?!" His face turns almost..."
links.text: "Wha-what?!" His face turns almost as red as his hair. "Are you fucking crazy, pig?! Cuno doesn't give two shits about that bird. Why do you even...?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Goddamnit..." He looks down, shaki..."
links.text: "Goddamnit..." He looks down, shaking his head. "Cuno can't believe you're making up shit about him. This needs to stop."

links.title: You: ""It's okay, I like her too.""
links.text: "It's okay, I like her too."

links.title: Cuno: ""Well *I* don't," the kid says, poi..."
links.text: "Well *I* don't," the kid says, pointing to himself with his thumb. "Cuno's got no time for this shit. He's a pig now."

links.title: Drama: "He tries to keep his voice casual a..."
links.text: He tries to keep his voice casual and businesslike, but it trembles ever so slightly.

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry, Cuno. I'll stop.""
links.text: "I'm sorry, Cuno. I'll stop."

links.title: Cuno: ""You fuckin' better, pig!" His inde..."
links.text: "You fuckin' better, pig!" His index finger is pointed straight at you. "We're partners now. You got to be professional with the Cuno."

links.title: You: ""Your secret is safe with me, Cuno...."
links.text: "Your secret is safe with me, Cuno." (Give him a wink.)

links.title: Cuno: ""What fucking secret?! You gotta st..."
links.text: "What fucking secret?! You gotta stop this shit with me!" He's trying to control himself. "Cuno's a pig. We're partners now. You got to be professional with the Cuno. Talk sense to him."

links.title: You: ""Lilienne is nice though.""
links.text: "Lilienne is nice though."

links.title: Cuno: ""She's okay," the kid suddenly spea..."
links.text: "She's okay," the kid suddenly speaks with a high pitched squeak. "I mean... With all the fucking drunks and relics around, she's like the only one who isn't a walking shit hole. She's okay."

links.title: Suggestion: "Sounds like the kid has a soft spot..."
links.text: Sounds like the kid has a soft spot for Lilienne.

links.title: You: ""About Martinaise...""
links.text: "About Martinaise..."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah?" He places his hands on the..."
links.text: "Yeah?" He places his hands on the hips, waiting for your question.

links.title: Logic: "Does he have a little *crush* on Li..."
links.text: Does he have a little *crush* on Lilienne?

links.title: Empathy: "Just don't ask him about it. Boys i..."
links.text: Just don't ask him about it. Boys in that age can be quite sensitive about such matters.

links.title: You: ""What did *you* do there?""
links.text: "What did *you* do there?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno had some business ventures se..."
links.text: "Cuno had some business ventures set up in the neighbourhood. Had money coming in... But not anymore." He punches an invisible target in the air. "Cuno's a straight-ass pig now."

links.title: Logic: "He was probably collecting tare or..."
links.text: He was probably collecting tare or stealing stuff that wasn't nailed down.

links.title: You: ""Anything you can tell me about the..."
links.text: "Anything you can tell me about the boardwalk with the ruins and the fishmarket?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Cool place. Lot's of shit to do th..."
links.text: "Cool place. Lot's of shit to do there."

links.title: You: ""You ever been inside the ruined bu..."
links.text: "You ever been inside the ruined building?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno's been everywhere, pig.""
links.text: "Cuno's been everywhere, pig."

links.title: You: ""Yeah? What's in there?""
links.text: "Yeah? What's in there?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno ain't spoiling this shit for..."
links.text: "Cuno ain't spoiling this shit for you." He gives you something akin to a wink. "You gotta climb in there yourself and check it out."

links.title: Half Light: "Liar. He doesn't have the guts to c..."
links.text: Liar. He doesn't have the guts to climb in there.

links.title: Drama: "The kid is admitting falsehood, sir..."
links.text: The kid is admitting falsehood, sire. He just doesn't know.

links.title: You: ""Like what?""
links.text: "Like what?"

links.title: Cuno: ""You know... break shit, throw shit..."
links.text: "You know... break shit, throw shit into the sea, throw shit into the windows, throw shit at the seagulls."

links.title: You: ""Cool.""
links.text: "Cool."

links.title: Cuno: ""You bet, pig!" He appreciates your..."
links.text: "You bet, pig!" He appreciates your validation. "Cuno lives the life to the max. Lives every day to the mega. Cuno's in the *moment* like that."

links.title: You: ""There seems to be a seafort in the..."
links.text: "There seems to be a seafort in the bay. Do you know anything about it?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, pig... yeah." He scratches h..."
links.text: "Yeah, pig... yeah." He scratches his head. "It's a... seafort. For... It's for defence, pig. Don't bore Cuno with this historic shit."

links.title: Rhetoric: "This is the extent of the boy's kno..."
links.text: This is the extent of the boy's knowledge.

links.title: You: ""Have you ever been there?""
links.text: "Have you ever been there?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, yeah..." He fidgets uncomfor..."
links.text: "Yeah, yeah..." He fidgets uncomfortably. "Of course Cuno's been there, but that was a long time ago and I was fucked. Been on the train for fucking days. Can't remember shit."

links.title: Rhetoric: "The *Train*. Speed-Train. Amphetami..."
links.text: The *Train*. Speed-Train. Amphetamine Express.

links.title: You: ""Thanks Cuno, but enough about Mart..."
links.text: "Thanks Cuno, but enough about Martinaise."

links.title: Cuno: ""Sure thing, pig." He nods. "What n..."
links.text: "Sure thing, pig." He nods. "What now?"

links.title: You: ""Where is Cunoesse?""
links.text: "Where is Cunoesse?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno doesn't want to talk about th..."
links.text: "Cuno doesn't want to talk about this shit." There is a moment of thoughtful silence. He almost looks behind him.

links.title: Composure: "That is a look of a man who knows h..."
links.text: That is a look of a man who knows he'll be looking over his shoulder for the rest of his life.

links.title: Cuno: ""That toxic shit's behind Cuno now.""
links.text: "That toxic shit's behind Cuno now."

links.title: You: ""What happened to your art thing?""
links.text: "What happened to your art thing?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Locust city?" He swallows. "Cuno d..."
links.text: "Locust city?" He swallows. "Cuno dropped that art shit coz Cuno's fucking *poor* and has shit for brains."

links.title: Empathy: "A truly rare moment of self pity."
links.text: A truly rare moment of self pity.

links.title: Cuno: ""You better not make Cuno fucking *..."
links.text: "You better not make Cuno fucking *cry* about his art-shit, okay? Change the subject, Cuno doesn't do that shit no more. Fuck that shit, fuck *everything*."

links.title: You: ""I want to buy the FALN pants.""
links.text: "I want to buy the FALN pants."

links.title: Cuno: "He unzips his jacket again and pull..."
links.text: He unzips his jacket again and pulls the pants from the plastic wrapping. "Here pig, we both FALN now. Performance Pigs. Let's try not to shit ourselves."

links.title: You: ""Let's move!" [Leave.]"
links.text: "Let's move!" [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Cuno: ""Cuno is present on the scene." He..."
dialogueTree.text: "Cuno is present on the scene." He looks around with his hands on his hips.

dialogueTree.title: Cuno: ""Fucking island is spooky as fuck...."
dialogueTree.text: "Fucking island is spooky as fuck. Cuno never liked it here."

dialogueTree.title: Cuno: ""Okay, so, we've got the old fuck."..."
dialogueTree.text: "Okay, so, we've got the old fuck." The kid whispers, his eyes bugging out of his skull with excitement.

links.title: You: ""We still need to get him back, but..."
links.text: "We still need to get him back, but... yeah. We got our man."

links.title: Cuno: ""Makes you proud to be a pig," the..."
links.text: "Makes you proud to be a pig," the kid says. "Oink oink."

links.title: You: ""Do you think he did it?""
links.text: "Do you think he did it?"

links.title: Cuno: "A crooked little smile. "Oh fuck, h..."
links.text: A crooked little smile. "Oh fuck, he's practically dyin' to big up how he did it. Just get him to cough it up. Cuno's got your back."

links.title: You: ""I'm slapping myself to get ideas!""
links.text: "I'm slapping myself to get ideas!"

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, Cuno can see that," the kid..."
links.text: "Yeah, Cuno can see that," the kid says seriously. "So can fuckin' murderoonie here. You should stop -- it's weird as fuck."

links.title: You: ""I'm trying to get him to confess...""
links.text: "I'm trying to get him to confess..."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yes, Cuno can see that. You got th..."
links.text: "Yes, Cuno can see that. You got this. Think of like..." He rubs his nose. "... what *other* shit he's done too. Cuno can tell he's a killer."

links.title: You: ""How do you think the questioning i..."
links.text: "How do you think the questioning is going?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Good." He nods. "I think it's goin..."
links.text: "Good." He nods. "I think it's going really fucking well." He leans closer. "Just cut it with the punching shit, alright? Makes us look like we got nothing."

links.title: Composure: "You hear that? He thinks you're ver..."
links.text: You hear that? He thinks you're very close...

links.title: You: ""What am I missing? What haven't I..."
links.text: "What am I missing? What haven't I done?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Also, the gun." The scratches his..."
links.text: "Also, the gun." The scratches his head. "Why you still haven't picked it up and used it against him is beyond Cuno."

links.title: Drama: "Good. Talk to him, demonstratively..."
links.text: Good. Talk to him, demonstratively pick it up, then push it along with the other accusations. This is a good idea.

links.title: Cuno: ""Well. There's the gun," he says, s..."
links.text: "Well. There's the gun," he says, scratching his head... "Why you still haven't picked it up and used it against him is beyond Cuno."

links.title: Cuno: ""We can take another look in the mi..."
links.text: "We can take another look in the mini-tower, where the bed was." He sniffs. "Let's check out where he shot my gimp. Ballistics shit. You should know that, pig."

links.title: Suggestion: "Good one, Cuno. It doesn't have to..."
links.text: Good one, Cuno. It doesn't have to hold in court. Just establish a line of sight and he'll do the rest himself.

links.title: Cuno: ""We never did that ballistics shit..."
links.text: "We never did that ballistics shit here." He sniffs. "Let's check out where he shot my gimp. You should know that shit, pig."

links.title: You: ""What can I put on him, to get him..."
links.text: "What can I put on him, to get him to confess?"

links.title: Cuno: ""He's into some ancient warrior shi..."
links.text: "He's into some ancient warrior shit. Hate shit. Pressure cook him. Push it on him, like -- motive shit. Pig style."

links.title: Logic: "Of course -- why didn't *you* think..."
links.text: Of course -- why didn't *you* think of it?! Motive shit. Pig style.

links.title: You: ""Okay, let's do this." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Okay, let's do this." [Leave.]

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno's in the game. Let's fucking..."
links.text: "Cuno's in the game. Let's fucking do this, pig." he whispers, excitedly.

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno's in the game. Let's fucking..."
links.text: "Cuno's in the game. Let's fucking do this, pig." he whispers, excitedly.

dialogueTree.title: Cuno: "Cuno doesn't say anything. Stares o..."
dialogueTree.text: Cuno doesn't say anything. Stares out the window. You're on your own.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Something tells you this is going t..."
links.text: Something tells you this is going to be a rough ride.
